thread.title: Stereophonics and Noel Gallagher to headline Clyde 1's Christmas Hydro show
thread.title_full: Stereophonics and Noel Gallagher to headline Clyde 1's Christmas Hydro show (From Herald Scotland)

author: Jill Castle
title: Stereophonics and Noel Gallagher to headline Clyde 1's Christmas Hydro show
text:
Music fans are in for a treat after Clyde 1 revealed the star-studded for its Christmas Live show will include Noel Gallagher and Stereophonics.
Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds, the Stereophonics, Foxes, Tom Odell and Kodaline will all perform at the event at the SSE Hydro on Tuesday, December 8.
Clyde unveiled the stellar line-up this morning on Twitter.
#Clyde1ChristmasLive @TomPeterOdell @Foxes @NoelGallagher @Kodaline @Stereophonics - BUY NOW http://t.co/lUqj00tJz1 pic.twitter.com/20A6MLFtkN
Share article — Clyde 1 (@1025Clyde1) October 12, 2015 Last year's headliners for the annual show included Passenger, Tulisa, Ella Eyre and Neon Jungle.
Tickets for the gig, priced £27.50, are on sale now.
